item.title: December 06, 2024 - Completed a Gamedev & Devlog

item.title: November 04, 2024 - Lowpoly Renders
item.description: I'm tired but I really need to finish this this day--I know that I can. Right now I'm adding the lowpoly models I worked on.

item.title: November 04, 2024 - My Page, Archiving, and Pokemon TCG (Pocket)
